definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be boastful,

definitions.title: Pi. praise
definitions.body: (Ar. hal=a shout, both in joy & (if conject. of Nö RS be right, v. cit. infr.) in terror; esp. II. in formula of worship; Syr. Pa. halel cecinit, laudavit; cf. NH [[הַלּוּל]] praise, [[הַלֵּל]] id., Hallel (Ps 113-118); Aram. [[הִילּוּלָא]] marriage-song, & c.; on As. alâlu, shout for joy, rejoice v. Lyon:Sargontexte 66 (Cylinder. 1. 36) also Winckler:Sargontexte 134, 1. 194; 156. 1. 149 KB:44. 1. 36; 80. 1. 194; all variations of cry aloud, cf. Nö:ZMG 1887, 723 RS:Sem. 411; perh. orig. break through, or out (in a cry), cf. We:Skizzen iii. 107 ff., esp. 109; comp. also (acc. to Prät:BAS i. 369 f.) Eth. tam4hlala: implore (cf. Amhar. Tigr.), & mahala: swear)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 2 mpl. [[תָּהָׂלּוּ]] Ps 75:5; Pt. [[הוֹלֲלִים]] Ps 5:6 + 2 t.;—be boastful [[אַל־תָּהָׂלּוּ]] Ps 75:5 (‖[[אַל־]] ([[תָּרִימוּקָָרֶן]]); Pt. boastful ones, boasters Ps 5:6 (‖[[פּׂעֲלֵי אָוֶן]]); Ps 73:3, Ps 75:5 (both ‖[[רְשָׁעִים]]).

praise man or woman, acc. [[וַיְהַלֲלוּ אׂתָהּ אֶל־פַּרְעׂה]] Ge 12:15 (J) and they praised her to Pharaoh, cf. Pr 27:2, Pr 31:28, Pr 31:31, Ct So 6:9; [[וְהַמְהַלֲלִים אֶת־הַמֶּלָךְ]] 2Ch 23:12 and those praising (shouting acclamations to) the king; v. also [[לְהַלֵּל מְאׂד]] 2Sa 14:25 (of Absalom's beauty); in bas sense [[עׂזְבֵי תוֹרָה יְהַלֲלוּ רָשָׁע]] Pr 28:4 deserters of law praise a wicked man.
usually praise [[אֱלֽהִים]], ´[[י]] etc.;

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: sq. acc. of heathen god Ju Jdg 16:24.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: obj. ´[[י]]([[אֱלֽהִים]] ); Ps 119:164 ([[עַל]] on account of), subj. heaven, earth, seas, etc., Ps 69:35; [[תְּחִי נַפְשִׁי ותְהַלֲלֶךָּ]] Ps 119:175; in summons to all creatures to praise Ps 148:5, Ps 148:13; Is 38:18 [[לאׁ שְׁאוֹל תּוֹדֶךָּ מָוֶת יְהַלֲלֶָךָּ]] (cf. Ps 115:17); often of Public worship in sanctuary, Is 62:9 (thanks giving in sanctuary after harvest), cf. Is 64:10, Ps 22:23 (‖[[אֲסַפְּרָה שִׁמְךָ]]), v:Ps 22:27, Ps 35:18, Ps 109:30 (both ‖[[אוֹדְךָ]]) Ps 107:32 (‖[[יְרוֹמֲמוּהוּ]]) Ps 84:5, v. also Ps 146:2 (‖´[[אֲוַמְּרָה לֵא]]) Ps 149:3 (c. [[בְּ]] instr.; ‖[[יְוַמְּרוּ לוֹ]]); also obj. ´[[שֵׁם י]] (in some cases of public worship) Ps 74:21, Ps 148:5, Joe 2:26 (thanksgiving after harvest); [[שֵׁם־אֱלֽהִים בְּשִׁיר]] Ps 69:31 (‖[[וִאֲגַדְּלֶנּוּ בְתוֹדָה]]), Ps 145:2 (‖[[אֲבָֽרֲכֶָךָּ]]); further, Ps 56:5 [[בֵּאלֽהִים אֲהַלֵּל דְּבָרוֹ]], also v:Ps 145:11 + v:Ps 145:11 ´[[ביהוה וגו]], but cf. Hup Che on Ps 145:11:b as editorial addition; obj. not expressed [[אֶת־עַמְּךָ]] ´[[הַשְׁמִיעוּ הַלֲלוּ וְאִמְרוּ הוֹשַׁע י]] Je 31:7, [[וְשִׂפְתֵי]] [[רְנׇנוֹת יְהַלֶּל־פִּי]] Ps 63:6.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: use of Imv. deserves special notice: [[הַלֲוּהוּ]] Ps 22:24 (‖[[כַּבְּדוּהוּ]]; of temple-worship cf. v:Ps 22:23, v:Ps 22:25); also in summons to angles, sun, moon, etc. (all created things) to praise ´[[י]] Ps 148:2, Ps 148:2, Ps 148:3, Ps 148:3, Ps 148:4, Ps 150:1; of temple-worship Ps 150:2 ([[בְּ]] on account of) v:Ps 150:2 ([[בְּ]]), v:Ps 150:3, v:Ps 150:3, v:Ps 150:4, v:Ps 150:4, v:Ps 150:5, v:Ps 150:5 (all c. [[בְּ]] instr.); further Je 20:13 (‖´[[שִׁירוּ לי]]), ´[[הַלֲלוּ אֶת־י]] Ps 117:1 (addressed to nations, ‖[[שַׁבְּחוּהוּ]]), Ps 148:7 (created things), [[חַלֲלִי אֱלֽהַיִךְ חִיּוֹן]] Ps 147:12 (‖[[שַׁבְּחִי יְרוּשָׁלַסִ]] ´[[אֶת־י]]).

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: also sq. [[ליהוה]], in Chr, of technical Levitical function (cf. Lag:Or.ii.16 ff., who limits this technical [[הלל]] to priests, using [[חֲחׂחְרוֹת]], for a signal to the people; v. e.g. Ne 12:24 cf. v:Ne 12:27), 1Ch 16:4 (with instrumental music, cf. [[בִּכְלֵי כְבָלִים וּבְכִנּׁרוֹת]] & [[בַּמְחִלְתַּיִ ם]], all v:1Ch 16:5, and Ne 12:27) 1Ch 23:30, 1Ch 25:3 (all ‖[[הוֹדוֹת]]); exercised (apparently) by both priests and Levites Ezr 3:11 (‖[[הׂדוֹת]]) cf. v:1Ch 25:11; by Levites 2Ch 20:19 ([[בְּקׂל גׇּדוֹל]]), 2Ch 29:30 ([[בְּדִבְרֵי דָוִיד]]) in which the people also joined 1Ch 16:36; also 2Ch 5:13 ([[בַּחֲחׂחְרוֹת וּבִמְחִלְתַּיִם וּבִכְלֵי הַשִּׁיר]] cf. also v:2Ch 5:12; ‖[[הׂדוֹת]], v:2Ch 5:13 appar. of Levites & priests), [[בַּכֵּלִים]] ´[[מְהַלֲלִים לי]] 1Ch 23:5 (Levites) cf. 2Ch 30:21 (Levites & priests ´[[בִּכְלֵיעׂז לי]]); sq. [[לְשֵׁם תִּפְאַרְתֶָּךָ]] 1Ch 29:13 (‖[[מוֹדִים]]; David speaks in name of people); sq. [[לְהַדְרַת־קָׂדֶשׁ]] 2Ch 20:11 (before the army; ‖´[[מְשׁׂרֲרִים לי]]; prob. of Levites, cf. v:2Ch 20:19).

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: sq. acc. ´[[י]] Ezr 3:10 (priests & Levites: [[עַל־יְדֵי]] [[דָּוִיד]]), Ne 5:13 (people).

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: other forms, with like technical sense, but abs.: [[לְהַלֵּל לְהוֹדוֹת]] [[בְּמִחְוַת דָּויד]] Ne 12:24 (Levites) cf. 1Ch 23:5, 2Ch 8:14, 2Ch 29:30 ([[עַד־לְשִׂמְחָה]]) 2Ch 31:2 (appar. priests & Levites; ´[[בְּשַׁעֲדֵי מֵחֲנוֹת י]]; ‖[[לְשָׁרֵת וּלְהׂוֹדוֹת]]); v. also [[מוֹדִיעִים לְהַלֵּל]] 2Ch 23:13 (‖[[מְשׁוֹרֲרִים בִּכְלַי הַשִּׁיר]] [[בְּהַלֵּל דָּוִיד בְּיׇדָם]] ). 2Ch 7:6 (‖[[הׂדוֹת ליהוּה]])
appar. boast, male one's boast cf.

definitions.title: Qal 2
definitions.body: (sq. [[בְּ]] in, of), [[בֵּאלֽהִים]] Ps 44:9 (‖[[שִׁמְךָ לְעוֹלָס נוֹדֶה]]); so acc. to most, in bad sense, [[רָשָׁע עַל־תַּאֲוַת נַפְשׁוֹ]] ´[[ה]] Ps 10:3 a wicked man boasteth of the desire of his soul, but Che praiseth (´[[י]]) for (i.e. in a mercenary spirit).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[הוּלָָּלוּ]] Ps 78:63; Impf. [[יְהֻלַּל־]] Pr 12:8; Pt. [[מְהֻלָּל]] 2Sa 22:4 + 6 t.; f. [[הַהֻלָָּלָה]] Ez Eze 26:17 (cf. Ol:§ 250 c Sta:§ 220, 617 b; MT, however, accents as Pf., regarding [[הַ]] as = relative, v. sta:§ 176 c Ges:§ 52. 2, R. 6);—be praised,
human subj. be praised, commended Pr 12:18 (opp. [[יִהְיֶה לָבוּז]]); of maidens, praised, celebrated (in song) Ps 78:63; pt. (v. supr.) of city, renowned Ez Eze 26:17.
of ´[[י]] only pt. = gerundive, to be praised, worthy of praise 2Sa 22:4 = Ps 181:4; [[מְאׂד]] ´[[וּמְה]] ´[[גׇּדוֹל י]] Ps 48:2, Ps 96:4 = 1Ch 16:25, Ps 145:3; so ´[[שֵׁם י]] ´[[מְה]] Ps 113:3.

of self-confident boasting, abs. 1Ki 20:11 cf. Pr 20:14; sq. [[בְּ]] of ground of boast Je 9:22, Je 9:22, Je 9:22, Je 49:4, Ps 49:7, Ps 52:3, Pr 25:14, [[אַל־תִּתְהַלֵּל]] [[בְּיוֹם מָחָר]] Pr 27:1; of glorying in idols [[הַמִּתְהַלֲלִים]] [[בָּאֱלִלִים]] Ps 97:7.

of glorying, making one's boast in ([[בְּ]], on the ground of) ´[[י]]:[[תִּתְהַלֵּל ]] ´[[בי]] [[נַפְשִׁי]] Ps 34:3, cf. Is 45:25, Je 4:2 (‖[[וְהִתְבָּֽרְכוּ בוֹ]]); sq. [[בִּקְדוֹשׁ יִשְׂרָאֵל]] Is 41:16; v. also Ps 105:3 = 1Ch 16:10 sq. [[בְּשֵׁם קָדְשׁוֹ]] (‖ ´[[יִשְׂמַה לֵב מְבֵקְשֵׁי י]]), cf. further Je 9:23; less oft. abs. Je 9:23, Ps 63:12, Ps 64:10 & Ps 106:5 sq. [[עִם־נַחֲלָתֶָךָ]] together with thine heritage (‖[[לִשְׂמׂהַ בְּשִׂמְהַת נּוֹ ֶי֑ךָ]]).
once, late = pass.be praised, commended, of God-fearing woman Pr 31:30.

definitions.title: Po‘el
definitions.body: Impf. [[יְהוֹלֵל]] Is 44:25 + 2 t.;—make into a fool, make fool of, obj. [[שׁׂפְטִים]] Job 12:17 (subj. ´[[י]]; ‖[[מוֹלִיךְ יוֹעֲחִים שׁוֹלָָל]]); obj. [[קׂסְמִים]] Is 44:25 (subj. ´[[י]] ‖[[מֵפֵר אׂתוֹת בַּדִּים ]]; obj. [[הָכָם]] Ec 7:7 (subj. [[הָעשֶׁק]]; ‖[[וִיאַבֵּד אֶת־לֵב מַתָּנׇה]]).

definitions.title: Po‘al
definitions.body: Pt. [[לִשְׂהוֹק אָמַרְתִּי מְהוֹלָָל]] Ec 2:2 of laughter I said, It is mad (folly); [[מְוֹלָלַי]] Ps 102:9 those mad against me (‖[[אוֹיְבָָי]]).

definitions.title: Hithpo.
definitions.body: Impf. [[ויִּתְהׂלֵל]] 1Sa 21:14; 3 mpl. [[יִתְהׂלֲלוּ]] Je 51:7, [[יִתְהוֹלֲלוּ]] Na 2:5, [[יִתְהׂלֶָלוּ]] Je 50:38; Imv. mpl. [[הִתְהׂלֲלוּ]] Je 49:9, [[הִתְהׂלָָלוּ]] Je 25:16; —act madly, or like a madman, [[וַיִּתְהׂלֵל]] [[בְּיׇרָם]] 1Sa 21:14 (of David) and he acted like a madman in their hands; of idolatrous worship by Chaldeans ´[[וּבָאֵימִים יִתְה]] Je 50:38; of nations, as drunken men, fig. of terror at Yahweh's judgements, Je 25:16 (‖[[הִתְגּׂעֲשׁוּ ]]) Je 51:7; also of madly driving & jolting chariots Na 2:5, Je 46:9.
